name: Project Unknown
description:
FREE PUBLIC ALPHA

Project Unknown (PU) is DLZ Studio's exclusive project that began its journey back in late 2017. What started as an exploration of side-scroller AI, turned into DLZs biggest project in history. PU currently features extensive multi-layer pseudorandom 3D world generation which includes numerous biomes, underground caves, and procedural structures. Gameplay mechanics are tailored towards an experimental and tactical approach - damage is dealt by projectile type and all applicable senses (touch/feel, sight, and sound) are simulated to create a comprehensive combat arena. Players are equipped with ballistic grenades and an interactive grappling hook to enhance the Experience.

This is a FREE PUBLIC ALPHA version that is subject to developmental updates to incorporate new content, fix bugs, and accommodate community feedback. Additional project information and discussions will be held on the Devlog.

CONTROLS

  • WASD - Movement/Jumping/Climbing
  • W x 2 - Wall Jump
  • E - Interact/Open Door/Use Elevator
  • R - Reload Weapon
  • Q - Throw Grenade
  • L-Click - Use Weapon
  • R-Click - Use Grappling Hook (On/Off)
  • TAB - Generate New World
  • Esc - Quit Game

TIPS

  • Silenced weapons generate a limited amount of noise, but can still be heard from close proximity.
  • Non-silenced weapons generate a lot of noise and reveal the player's position to enemy forces nearby.
  • Hostile forces are alerted by dead bodies.
  • You can jump on hostiles for a stealthy insta-kill.
  • The aiming reticle turns red when you run out of ammo.
  • Run against crates to push them and provide additional cover from enemy fire.
  • Listen for hostile footsteps before planning a dangerous run across the map.
  • Throwing a grenade also makes noise.
  • Grenades always kill.
  • Stealth and agility are your best friends for survival.

RECOMMENDED SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS (60FPS+)

  • GTX-750 Ti / RX-460 GPU or Better
  • 2.0 GHz Quad-Core CPU or Better
  • Windows 7/8/10
